    • buy

      public static double[] buy(int investmentFound, String quantity, String price, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the updated bookValue and quantity of the stock whose shares are to be purchased
      Parameters:
      investmentFound - Integer representing the index position of the stock whose shares are to be purchased
      quantity - Integer representing the quantity of the stock whose shares are to be purchased
      price - Double representing the price of the stock whose shares are to be purchased
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Double[],which is an array of double values where the elements are the updated bookValue and quantity of a stock

    • remove

      public double[] remove(ArrayList<Investment> investments, int quantity, double price)
      This method returns the payment and gain of the stock whose shares are to be sold and that stock should be removed
      Specified by:
      remove in class Investment
      Parameters:
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      quantity - Integer representing the quantity of the stock(to be removed) whose shares are to be sold
      price - Double representing the price of the stock(to be removed) whose shares are to be sold
      Returns:
      Double[],which is an array of double values where the elements are the payment and gain of a stock

    • sell

      public double[] sell(int quantity, int availQuantity, double price, ArrayList<Investment> investments)
      This method returns the payment,gain and the remaining bookValue of the stock whose shares are to be sold
      Specified by:
      sell in class Investment
      Parameters:
      quantity - Integer representing the quantity of the stock whose shares are to be sold
      availQuantity - Integer representing the existing quantity of the stock whose shares are to be sold
      price - Double representing the price of the stock whose shares are to be sold
      investments - Arraylist representing all the investments
      Returns:
      Double[],which is an array of double values where the elements are the payment, gain and the remaining bookValue of a stock
